definition: letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China

sentences.english: These crusaders understand that the world is a dangerous place.
sentences.chinese: 這些十字軍明白這個世界是個危險的地方。

sentences.english: There is a price crusaders need to pay for their military misadventures.
sentences.chinese: 這是十字軍爲自己的軍事冒險付出的代價。

sentences.english: They are not just ancient history.
sentences.chinese: 從這個角度說，十字軍東征不僅僅是古代史。

sentences.english: I'll also look in detail at the risks and rewards of crusades and jihads.
sentences.chinese: 我同樣會展示十字軍東征和聖戰的風險和回報的細節。

sentences.english: Many jihadis fear the Crusader alliance between Jews and Christians.
sentences.chinese: 很多聖戰者害怕猶太教和基督教之間的十字軍聯盟。

sentences.english: Yes, the Crusades died off, but it was regaining popularity.
sentences.chinese: 士兵們雖然相繼死去，但是十字軍的陰魂一直未散。

sentences.english: We may still add a second ary effect to Crus ader Strike too.
sentences.chinese: 我們還計劃爲十字軍打擊增加一個額外的效果。

sentences.english: Crusader Strike (Retribution) will now properly receive a damage increase from Seal of The Crusader.
sentences.chinese: 現在正確的收到十字軍聖印效果的影響。

sentences.english: Crusaders declaring war on Byz every time they pass their lands fixed.
sentences.chinese: 十字軍向拜占庭宣戰，修正了他們的行走路線。

sentences.english: Ireland in Crusader Kings II is known as tutorial island, as an entire game in itself.
sentences.chinese: 愛爾蘭在十字軍之王2裏被稱爲教程島。

sentences.english: Seal of the Crusader has been removed. The effects of Judgement of the Crusader have been folded into all relevant abilities.
sentences.chinese: 十字軍聖印移除，審判效果整合到所有相應技能中。

sentences.english: Think of the crusades and the Inquisition.
sentences.chinese: 想想十字軍和宗教法庭吧。

sentences.english: Polo: The most famous of the English Crusaders was Richard Lion-Heart.
sentences.chinese: 英國十字軍裏最著名的是獅心王裏查德。

sentences.english: Washington’s crusaders lacked a cogent answer.
sentences.chinese: 華盛頓的十字軍們缺乏一個令人信服的回答。

sentences.english: A French crusader called Raymond of Agiles left this account.
sentences.chinese: 一位叫做阿吉爾的雷蒙德的法國十字軍這樣寫道。

sentences.english: The crusades have left a deep mark on the Middle East.
sentences.chinese: 十字軍東征給中東留下了不可磨滅的印象。

definition: to mess sth up/to screw up
Leonardo da Vinci (1452-1519), Italian Renaissance painter (Tw)
to turn white-hot/to intensify/to reach a climax
